CodeBlockMethod.Name: OnBehave
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
if self.ParentAI.time >= 0.1 then local MonsterEntity = self.ParentAI.Entity if MonsterEntity.RigidbodyComponent.IsQuaterViewMove == false then local MonsterPos = MonsterEntity.TransformComponent.Position
MonsterEntity.StateComponent:ChangeState("MOVE")
MonsterEntity.RigidbodyComponent.IsQuaterViewMove = true MonsterEntity.MovementComponent:SetPosition(Vector2(MonsterPos.x, MonsterPos.y)) end
MonsterEntity.MovementComponent:MoveToDirection(Vector2(0,1), 1)
--log("climb") end
return BehaviourTreeStatus.Success
